declarations.name: KdsAlertContextual

cssProperties.description: Font size of the alert text
cssProperties.name: --mod-alert-font-size

slots.description: Default slot for the alert message text

members.name: status
members.description:
The status/type of the alert.
- `info`: Information status (blue)
- `positive`: Success/positive status (green)
- `negative`: Error/negative status (red)
- `warning`: Warning status (orange/amber)

members.name: size
members.description:
The size of the alert.
- `sm`: Small size
- `md`: Medium size (default)

declarations.summary: A contextual alert component for displaying status messages.

declarations.name: KdsButtonGroup

cssProperties.description: Applied to button children to control corner radius (used in gap="none" mode)
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-border-radius

slots.description: Default slot for button children (kds-button components)

members.name: gap
members.description:
Controls spacing between buttons. When set to "none", buttons are visually
connected with shared borders and proper corner radius management.

members.name: direction
members.description: Controls button orientation (horizontal or vertical layout).

members.name: justify
members.description: Controls alignment along the main axis using CSS justify-content.

members.name: stretch
members.description:
When true, buttons distribute at equal widths and stack vertically
on smaller containers via container query (30rem breakpoint).

members.name: autoStack
members.description:
When true, buttons stack vertically at the 30rem container breakpoint
without equal-width distribution. Buttons maintain their natural width.

declarations.summary: A flexible container for grouping multiple buttons together.

declarations.name: KDSButton

cssProperties.description: Gap between label and start/end slots.
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-gap

cssProperties.description: Border width for inline-start (left in LTR).
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-border-width-inline-start

cssProperties.description: Border width for inline-end (right in LTR).
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-border-width-inline-end

cssProperties.description: Border color for inline-start (left in LTR).
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-border-color-inline-start

cssProperties.description: Border color for inline-end (right in LTR).
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-border-color-inline-end

cssProperties.description: Border color for block-start on hover.
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-border-color-block-start-hover

cssProperties.description: Border color for block-end on hover.
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-border-color-block-end-hover

cssProperties.description: Border color for inline-start on hover.
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-border-color-inline-start-hover

cssProperties.description: Border color for inline-end on hover.
cssProperties.name: --mod-btn-border-color-inline-end-hover

slots.description: slot used for projecting a button label.
slots.name: Default

slots.description: For icon or element before the label.
slots.name: start

slots.description: For icon or element after the label.
slots.name: end

members.name: priority
members.description:
Defines the visual priority of the button. When set, it overrides
the `color` and `variant` properties to enforce consistent styling.

- `primary`: Main action (default style)
- `secondary`: Secondary action
- `tertiary`: Low emphasis or subtle action

members.name: color
members.description:
Sets the semantic color of the button.
Ignored if `priority` is set.

- `neutral`: Default styling
- `positive`: Success or confirmation
- `negative`: Destructive or error
- `warning`: Caution or warning
- `info`: Informational context

members.name: variant
members.description:
Controls the button's style variant.
Ignored if `priority` is set.

- `solid`: Filled background
- `outline`: Transparent with border
- `transparent`: No border or fill
- `link`: Styled as a text link

members.name: size
members.description:
Controls the button size.

- `xs`: Extra small
- `sm`: Small
- `md`: Medium (default)
- `lg`: Large

members.name: pending
members.description:
Shows a pending state and suppresses interaction while true.
When pending, the button blocks clicks/submits and displays a spinner.

members.name: pendingLabel
members.description:
Accessible label prefix used while pending (combined with the base label).
Example: `pending-label="Saving"` â†’ "Saving Save changes".

members.name: tabindex
members.description: Sets the tab order of the button element.

members.name: type
members.description:
The native button `type` attribute.

- `button` (default)
- `submit`
- `reset`

This attribute is ignored when `href` is present.

members.name: disabled
members.description:
Disables the button, preventing user interaction.
This attribute is ignored when `href` is present.

members.name: name
members.description:
The `name` attribute used when the button is inside a form.
This attribute is ignored when `href` is present.

members.name: value
members.description:
The `value` attribute submitted with the form when clicked.
This attribute is ignored when `href` is present.

members.name: form
members.description:
The `form` attribute specifying the form the button is associated with.
  This attribute is ignored when `href` is present.

members.name: href
members.description: When set, the component renders as an anchor tag instead of a button.

members.name: target
members.description: Tells the browser where to open the link. Only used when `href` is present.

members.name: rel
members.description: When using `href`, this attribute will map to the underlying link's `rel` attribute.

members.name: focus
members.description:
Sets focus on the button and anchor.
Useful for programmatically triggering focus-related behavior.

members.name: blur
members.description:
Removes focus on the button and anchor.
Useful for programmatically triggering blur-related behavior.

events.name: kds-pending-change
events.description: Emitted when `pending` changes. Detail: `{ pending: boolean }`.

declarations.summary: A clickable element for triggering actions.

members.name: label
members.description: Text label rendered as the fieldset legend.

members.name: helpText
members.description: Helper text displayed below the group.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error message shown when invalid.

members.name: required
members.description: Marks the group as required.

members.name: hideLabel
members.description: Visually hides the legend while keeping it accessible to screen readers.

members.name: size
members.description:
Controls the size of the checkboxes in the group.
- `sm`: Small
- `md`: Medium (default)

members.name: invalid
members.description: Whether the group is in an invalid state.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Disables all child checkboxes in the group.

members.name: direction
members.description: Layout direction for the group.

members.name: gap
members.description: Gap size between grouped checkboxes.

members.name: value
members.description: The values of all checked checkboxes in the group.

members.name: updateSlottedElements
members.description: Propagates the group's size, invalid, and disabled state to all slotted checkboxes.

members.name: handleSlotChange
members.description: Handles slot content changes.

members.name: handleCheckboxChange
members.description: Handles checkbox change events and tracks group values.

members.name: updateGroupValue
members.description: Updates the group's value array from checked checkboxes.

members.name: checkValidity
members.description:
Checks validity of the group.
For now, basic implementation. Can be extended for min/max selection requirements.

members.name: reportValidity
members.description: Reports validity and shows validation message if invalid.

members.name: formDisabledCallback
members.description: Called when a containing fieldset is disabled.

members.name: formResetCallback
members.description: Called when the form is reset.

declarations.name: KdsCheckbox

slots.description: Default slot for checkbox label text
Optional help text shown below the checkbox
slots.name: help-text

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the checkbox, submitted as a name/value pair with form data.

members.name: value
members.description: The value of the checkbox, submitted with the name when the checkbox is checked.

members.name: checked
members.description: Whether the checkbox is checked.

members.name: size
members.description: The checkbox's size.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Disables the checkbox.

members.name: required
members.description: Makes the checkbox a required field.

members.name: invalid
members.description: Indicates the checkbox is in an invalid state.

members.name: indeterminate
members.description: Puts the checkbox in an indeterminate state (neither checked nor unchecked).

members.name: helpText
members.description: The checkbox's help text. Alternatively, use the help-text slot.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: The checkbox's error message. Alternatively, use the error-message slot.

members.name: reportValidity
members.description: Checks for validity and shows the browser's validation message if invalid.

members.name: checkValidity
members.description: Checks for validity but doesn't show a validation message.

events.description: Fired when checked state changes. Detail: { checked: boolean, value: string }
events.name: kds-change

declarations.summary: A checkbox input with label, error, and help text support

members.name: label
members.description: Text label rendered as the fieldset legend.

members.name: helpText
members.description:
Helper text displayed below the group.
Can also be provided via the `help-text` slot.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error message shown below the group when invalid (if no `error` slot provided).

members.name: required
members.description: Marks the group as required, showing a required indicator on the legend.

members.name: hideLabel
members.description:
Visually hides the legend while keeping it accessible to screen readers.
Uses the sr-only pattern (position: absolute with 1px dimensions).

members.name: size
members.description:
Controls the size of the group, affecting all child components.

- `sm`: Small
- `md`: Medium (default)

members.name: invalid
members.description:
Whether the group is in an invalid state.
This will be applied to all child components and shows error styling.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Disables all child form controls in the group.

members.name: direction
members.description: Layout direction for the group. Use 'column' for radio/checkbox groups.

members.name: gap
members.description: Gap size between grouped elements.

members.name: value
members.description:
The value of the selected radio (for radio groups).
Automatically tracks which radio is checked.

members.name: updateSlottedElements
members.description:
Propagates the group's size, invalid, and disabled state to all slotted elements.
This ensures child components (like inputs, buttons, selects) inherit the group's state.

Only updates properties that exist on each slotted element (duck typing approach).

members.name: handleSlotChange
members.description:
Handles slot content changes.
Propagates properties to newly slotted elements and updates border radius.

members.name: handleRadioChange
members.description: Handles radio button change events for coordinating radio groups.

members.name: getRadios
members.description: Gets all radio buttons in the default slot.

members.name: updateRadioTabIndexes
members.description:
Implements roving tabindex for radio button keyboard navigation.
Only one radio should be tabbable at a time.

declarations.name: KdsProgressCircle

cssProperties.description: Color of the active progress arc.
cssProperties.name: --mod-progress-indicator-color

members.name: progress
members.description:
Determinate progress percentage (0-100). Omit for spinner mode.
Fractions are allowed and will render proportionally.

members.name: label
members.description: Optional accessible label. Provide when the spinner conveys status.

members.name: size
members.description:
Preset sizes mapped to design tokens.

- `xs`: Extra small
- `sm`: Small
- `md`: Medium (default)
- `lg`: Large
- `xl`: Extra large

declarations.summary: Circular indicator for determinate progress values or indeterminate loading states.

members.name: label
members.description: Text label rendered as the fieldset legend.

members.name: helpText
members.description: Helper text displayed below the group.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error message shown when invalid.

members.name: required
members.description: Marks the group as required.

members.name: hideLabel
members.description: Visually hides the legend while keeping it accessible to screen readers.

members.name: size
members.description:
Controls the size of the radios in the group.
- `sm`: Small
- `md`: Medium (default)

members.name: invalid
members.description: Whether the group is in an invalid state.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Disables all child radios in the group.

members.name: direction
members.description: Layout direction for the group.

members.name: gap
members.description: Gap size between grouped radios.

members.name: value
members.description: The value of the selected radio in the group.

members.name: updateSlottedElements
members.description: Propagates the group's size, invalid, and disabled state to all slotted radios.

members.name: handleSlotChange
members.description: Handles slot content changes.

members.name: handleRadioChange
members.description: Handles radio change events and maintains single selection.

members.name: getRadios
members.description: Gets all radio buttons in the default slot.

members.name: updateRadioTabIndexes
members.description:
Implements roving tabindex for radio button keyboard navigation.
Only one radio should be tabbable at a time (the checked one, or first if none checked).

members.name: checkValidity
members.description: Checks validity of the group.

members.name: reportValidity
members.description: Reports validity and shows validation message if invalid.

members.name: formDisabledCallback
members.description: Called when a containing fieldset is disabled.

members.name: formResetCallback
members.description: Called when the form is reset.

declarations.name: KdsRadio

slots.description: Default slot for radio label text
Optional help text shown below the radio
slots.name: help-text

members.name: name
members.description:
The name of the radio button, submitted as a name/value pair with form data.
All radios in a group must share the same name.

members.name: value
members.description: The value of the radio button, submitted with the name when selected.

members.name: checked
members.description: Whether the radio is checked.

members.name: size
members.description: The radio's size.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Disables the radio.

members.name: required
members.description: Makes the radio a required field (when in a group, at least one must be selected).

members.name: invalid
members.description: Indicates the radio is in an invalid state.

members.name: helpText
members.description: The radio's help text. Alternatively, use the help-text slot.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: The radio's error message. Alternatively, use the error-message slot.

members.name: reportValidity
members.description: Checks for validity and shows the browser's validation message if invalid.

members.name: checkValidity
members.description: Checks for validity but doesn't show a validation message.

events.description: Fired when radio is selected. Detail: { checked: boolean, value: string }
events.name: kds-change

declarations.summary: A radio button input with label, error, and help text support

members.name: value
members.description: Current value of the input.

members.name: placeholder
members.description: Placeholder text displayed when the input is empty.

members.name: label
members.description: Text label rendered above the field.

members.name: hideLabel
members.description: Visually hides the label while keeping it accessible to screen readers.

members.name: size
members.description:
Controls the input size.

- `sm`: Small
- `md`: Medium (default)

members.name: type
members.description: Native input `type` (e.g., "text", "email", "number").

members.name: name
members.description: Native `name` for form submission.

members.name: required
members.description: Marks the field as required.

members.name: disabled
members.description:
Disables the control and prevents interaction.
Reflected to allow CSS styling with `:host([disabled])`.

members.name: helpText
members.description:
Helper text displayed below the field.
Can also be provided via the `help-text` slot.

members.name: readonly
members.description:
Makes the field read-only (non-editable).
Reflected to allow CSS styling with `:host([readonly])`.

members.name: invalid
members.description:
Sets the invalid state and updates `aria-invalid`.
Reflected to allow CSS styling with `:host([invalid])`.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error message shown below the field when invalid (if no `error` slot provided).

members.name: autocomplete
members.description: Native `autocomplete` hint.

members.name: min
members.description: Native numeric/date lower bound.

members.name: max
members.description: Native numeric/date upper bound.

members.name: step
members.description: Native numeric/date step increment.

members.name: maxlength
members.description: Native maximum length (characters).

members.name: minlength
members.description: Native minimum length (characters).

members.name: pattern
members.description: Native validation pattern (regular expression string).

members.name: clearable
members.description:
Shows a clear button when the field has a value.
Clicking the button or pressing Escape clears the input.

members.name: focus
members.description: Sets focus to the input element.

members.name: blur
members.description: Removes focus from the input element.

members.name: select
members.description: Selects all text in the input element.

members.name: checkValidity
members.description:
Checks the input's validity and returns `true` if valid, `false` otherwise.
Also updates the internal validity state.

members.name: reportValidity
members.description:
Checks the input's validity and reports it to the user.
Returns `true` if valid, `false` otherwise.
When invalid, shows the browser's native validation UI.
